FuncDef: This command enables the use of the hash label on a VLL, VPLS, or VPRN service bound to any MPLS-type encapsulated SDP as well as to a VPRN service usingauto-bind-tunnelwith theresolution-filterconfigured as any MPLS tunnel type. This feature is not supported on a service bound to a GRE SDP or for a VPRN service using the autobind mode with the gre option.
